title: fried Goosnargh egg with wild mushroom, toasted brioche and truffle mayonnaise
description: This incredible breakfast of fried breaded eggs and mushrooms will certainly make an impression. Go on. It's Christmas.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
4 slices of brioche, 12.5cm/5in long, 5cm/2in wide and 5mm/¼in thick
4 tbsp chicken demi-glace, warmed (200ml/7floz chicken stock simmered over a low heat until reduced to 4 tbsp)
